parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True gets the end condition in the forward direction, false gets it in the reverse direction

title: ISurfExtrudeFeatureData.GetEndCondition
description: Gets the end condition of this extruded surface for the forward or reverse direction.

parameters.description: True gets the end condition in the forward direction, false gets it in the reverse direction
